programme.title: Rabu Belajar Episode 90 Seni Berkomunikasi & Public Speaking
Ramadan The Series. “Bu Juju (Julid & Judes)_ Into the Madness”
Pj. Gub Heru Pastikan Penataan Jaringan Utilitas Sesuai Standar Jakarta sebagai
Musrembang Tahun 2023 tingkat Kota_Kabupaten, di Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Pusat
Nikmati Perjalanan LRT Rute Velodrome, Korsel Antusias Investasi Pembangunan LRT
Targetkan WTP, Pemprov DKI Jakarta Serahkan LKPD Tahun 2022 kepada BPK
HUT Satpol PP dan Satlinmas Solid, Tanggap, dan Humanis Layani Mayarakat

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Cormack tries to track Anton down to question him, but he's disappeared. When Cormack and Hazel discover that Kalana is also missing, they fear the worst.

programme.title: How Deadly
programme.desc: With their claws, teeth and whip-like tails, goannas are fearsome predators. But do they attack humans? Dr Ann Jones examines goanna 'attacks' videos to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jane tours a stunning country garden, Jerry curbs useful but vigorous plants, Clarence showcases potted features, Guest Presenter Jac combines plant colours and forms, and we meet a photographic artist who loves native flora.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Hosts Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the latest in news, politics, sports and entertainment from across the Pacific. Featuring on-the-ground reporting from a trusted network of correspondents.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: Live from Canberra, Matthew Doran brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders. Plus a panel recap the week's top stories.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jane tours a stunning country garden, Jerry curbs useful but vigorous plants, Clarence showcases potted features, Guest Presenter Jac combines plant colours and forms, and we meet a photographic artist who loves native flora.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: AFLW
programme.desc: 18 teams take part in the 2024 AFLW Season as Australia's leading women's footballers play in 11 home and away rounds plus four weeks of finals to decide the AFLW Premiership.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's going on in our world. At the earlier time of 9pm AEST Manny Tsigas brings you the latest international news and interviews with correspondents and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jane tours a stunning country garden, Jerry curbs useful but vigorous plants, Clarence showcases potted features, Guest Presenter Jac combines plant colours and forms, and we meet a photographic artist who loves native flora.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat
programme.desc: Chas and John are joined by special guests for a deep dive on the big issues and topics making news on the campaign trail this week including the Veep Debate between Tim Walz and JD Vance.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong presents the biggest current stories on Asia and why they matter. Covering China, Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Malaysia, Philippines, India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, Indonesia, South Korea and Japan.

programme.title: Better Date Than Never
programme.desc: Olivia is a high achieving advocate for people with Down syndrome, about to step out on her first ever date. Since coming out as gay, Charles hasn't had any luck finding love. Nirvali dives headfirst into the dating world.

programme.desc: From the end of World War 2 in 1949, immigration changes the face of Australia and this influx of labour and the diversification of the economy lead to prosperity.

programme.title: Health China
programme.desc: Health China

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lam’s daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father’s underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau’s economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help…

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of “Infernal Affairs” are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident…

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tung’s mad fate?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father’s underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau’s economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help…

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of “Infernal Affairs” are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident…

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tung’s mad fate?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Petualangan 100 Jam
programme.desc: Budiman yang berusia 10 tahun hendak berpetualang dari desanya di Muntilan ke Jakarta. Selama perjalanan tersebut Budiman mengalami banyak hal yang belum pernah dialaminya.

programme.title: Karmila
programme.desc: Karmila yang mengandung karena diperkosa oleh pacarnya tidak menerima kehadiran sang anak. Sikapnya berubah saat sang anak sakit keras.

Menceritakan tentang rumah yang baru ditempati oleh Kevin dan Nayla. Mereka bertetangga oleh Julian, Dita dan anaknya Lila. Namun ternyata rumah mereka berpenghuni mahluk halus yang selalu meneror keluarga-nya. Kejadian fatal yang membuat Nayla membunuh Kevin adalah ketika Nayla diperkosa oleh mahluk halus yang menyerupai Kevin hingga Nayla hamil.

programme.title: Antri Dong
programme.desc: Dendy, pemuda mata keranjang yang berhubungan dengan tiga wanita, Linda, Cindy dan Sally. Masalah datang saat mereka bertiga datang di hari ulang tahunnya.

programme.title: Paku
programme.desc: Berkisah tentang Fahmi yang kehilangan istri tercintanya. Ia tidak ikhlas dan memutuskan mengunakan paku kuntilanak untuk membangkitkan istrinya lagi dari kematian. Semenjak istrinya bangkit kembali, banyak kejadian aneh yang datang. Hingga istrinya melahirkan anak perempuan yang dimana tidak sepenuhnya manusia.

programme.title: Lorong
programme.desc: Menceritakan kejanggalan sebuah rumah sakit tempat Mayang melahirkan. Misteri yang terjadi pada Mayang dan Reza ini berhubungan dengan keberadaan bayi mereka.

programme.title: Selamanya
programme.desc: Aristha berjumpa dengan kekasih lamanya, Bara, di kantor polisi. Bara, yang merasa bersalah karena menjerumuskan Aristha ke dunia narkoba, berusaha keras menarik Aristha dari dunia itu

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Lagi
programme.desc: Lila adalah pengacara idealis yang suka membela perempuan teraniaya dan Andre adalah pengacara dengan kasus-kasus "kelas kakap". Keduanya bertemu dalam kasus perceraian seorang penyanyi dangdut

programme.title: Jamila Dan Sang Presiden
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan bernama Jamila tiba-tiba menjadi headline di semua pemberitaan nasional. Ia mengaku membunuh seorang pejabat tinggi dan menolak mengajukan grasi kepada Presiden.

programme.title: Gentayangan
programme.desc: Abimanyu Karindra tak punya pilihan selain membawa istrinya, Sofia dan kedua anak mereka serta adiknya Sheila untuk menetap di hotel peninggalan orangtua di lembah gunung ratusan kilometer dari Jakarta, setelah dinyatakan bangkrut oleh pengadilan. Hotel Kaki Langit yang awalnya dianggap sebagai tempat tinggal yang nyaman dan tenang, berubah menjadi teror menakutkan hanya beberapa saat setelah keluarga Karindra mulai menempatinya.

programme.title: Mangkujiwo
programme.desc: Awal mula lahirnya kuntilanak. Kanthi adalah perempuan biasa yang jadi korban perseteruan Brotoseno dan Cokrokusumo dalam memperebutkan pengaruh dan kekuasaan atas Loji Pusaka.

programme.title: Hantu Juga Selfie
programme.desc: Helsi meninggal karena selfie, ia meneror temen-teman semasa hidupnya ketika mereka melakukan selfie. Hal ini membuat teman-temanya ketakutan, apa lagi bukan hanya sosok Helsi yang ada dalam foto namun hantu-hantu kocak lainya juga ada saat mereka berlibur di sebuah pulau.

programme.title: Melodi Cinta Rhoma Irama
programme.desc: Rhoma jatuh cinta dengan Ricca dan sempat merencanakan pernikahan. Namun jalinan cinta mereka diganggu oleh Herman yang juga mencintai Ricca dan ingin menguasai harta ayah Ricca

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Beda
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang sepasang kekasih yang berbeda keyakinan Diana dan Cahyo. Namun saat mereka mulai mencoba melanjutkan ke jenjang yang lebih serius, orang tua mereka sangat bertentangan dengan rencana ini. Hingga dilema mereka memuncak saat Diana dijodohkan oleh Oka pria pilihan ibunya.

programme.title: Pulau Hantu 3
programme.desc: Berkisah mengenai serangkaian pembunuhan yang terjadi di resor Pulau Madara. Diawali dengan dibukanya kembali resor angker tersebut hingga pada akhirnya peristiwa pembunuhan yang sama kembali terjadi di sana.

programme.title: Senggol-Senggolan
programme.desc: Elvi dan Adi yang yatim piatu pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari Johny, seorang promotor pertunjukan yang pernah meminta Elvi bernyanyi di desanya. Sesampainya disana mereka terpisah. Adi hidup mirip gelandangan sementara Elvi masuk rekaman dan sukses. Elvi terus mencari adiknya yang ternyata adalah sahabat supir Dicky, kekasih sekaligus produser Elvi. Pencarian pun akhirnya membuahkan hasil.

programme.title: Cintaku Di Kampus Biru
programme.desc: Anton, mahasiswa cerdas, aktivis, ganteng, dan seolah penakluk wanita. Ia menghadapi masalah lain: seorang dosen yang dianggap menghambat mahasiswa, Yusnita. Anton berusaha menaklukkan Yusnita untuk mengatasi masalahnya

programme.title: Pulau Hantu
programme.desc: Delapan sahabat hendak pergi berlibur, namun kapal pesiar yang mereka tumpangi harus berbelok arah dan menurunkan mereka di sebuah pulau kecil yang indah. Namun, di balik keindahan pulau tersebut, terdapat rahasia yang membawa maut

programme.title: Dorce Sok Akrab
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang dua orang yang sama-sama mempunyai anak kembar dan sama-sama menamai anaknya dengan nama yang sama, Dorce dan kadir. Hal inilah yang menimbulkan kebingungan dan kekacauan ketika Saudara dari Pak Sugeng malah menjemput si kembar anak Pak Slamet. Semua bisa terselesaikan ketika Pak Slamet datang untuk mengakhiri kebingungan tersebut

programme.title: Ummi Aminah
programme.desc: Ummi Aminah, ustadzah 68 tahun, memiliki jamaah setia mencapai ribuan. Ummi memiliki tujuh anak dengan berbagai macam perbedaan sifatnya

programme.title: Kuntilanak
programme.desc: Di kamar kost baru Samantha, terdapat mitos kuntilanak & dia mulai merasakan keanehan yang berujung pada terungkapnya jati diri Sam yang sebenarnya.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 2 (2019)
programme.desc: Di film pertama, Dinda berhasil lolos dari teror kuntilanak. Ia kemudian berniat menemui Karmila yang diyakini sebagai ibu kandungnya. Sialnya, Dinda yang berangkat bersama adik dan temannya malah terjebak dalam rumah di tengah hutan. Kejanggalan mulai terjadi di rumah tersebut. Dinda harus kembali berhadapan dengan kuntilanak.

programme.title: Dunia Mereka
programme.desc: Film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah band yang terdiri dari beberapa orang yang mempertemukan mereka karena selera musik yang sama. Namun dalam perjalanan mereka, berbagai masalah pun berdatangan.

programme.title: Tiga
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang masa depan di tahun 2036. Dikisahkan oleh tiga sahabat bernama Alif, Lam dan Mim yang ditemukan dengan situasi dimana mereka harus berjuangan atas kebenaran masing-masing.

programme.title: Hijrah Cinta
programme.desc: Film ini mengisahkan tentang almarhum ustad gaul Jeffri Al-Buchori. Perjuangan dalam hidupnya untuk menjadi manusia lebih baik lagi ketika ia mencintai Pipik dan ia pun juga meninggalkan narkoba.

programme.title: Giliran Saya Mana
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang pasangan muda yang terpaksa kawin lari karena orangtua sang wanita hanya mau anaknya menikah dengan orang kaya. Setelah menikah, mereka berdua mengaku sudah kaya, padahal belum. masalah bermula ketika mereka memutuskan untuk berpura-pura menjadi orang kaya dan meminjam rumah mewah kepada temannya. Disinilah adegan-adegan lucu banyak disajikan, sampai akhirnya mereka ketahuan jikalau mereka berbohong.

programme.title: Hijab
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keempat sahabat Anin, Bia,Tata dan Sari. Mereka mempunyai gaya berpenampilan berbeda-beda kecuali Anin yang tidak memakai Hijab. Kegalauan mereka semakin meningkat karena mereka berhijab dan mendapatkan uang dari "Ikut Suami". Namun hal itu dibantah dengan mereka membangun bisnis Hijab dan berhasil. Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

Menceritakan tentang rumah yang baru ditempati oleh Kevin dan Nayla. Mereka bertetangga oleh Julian, Dita dan anaknya Lila. Namun ternyata rumah mereka berpenghuni mahluk halus yang selalu meneror keluarga-nya. Kejadian fatal yang membuat Nayla membunuh Kevin adalah ketika Nayla diperkosa oleh mahluk halus yang menyerupai Kevin hingga Nayla hamil.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak Lagi
programme.desc: Jody kini sudah beranjak kuliah. Dirinya menjadi playboy dikalangan warga kampus dan menjadi panutan bagi tiga perjaka kampus, yakni Fredo, Hakim, dan Menfo. Ketiganya selalu mencoba mengikuti gaya-gaya Jody dalam menjalankan kehidupan cintanya.

programme.title: Bunga Cinta Kasih
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Trisna, anak dari kampung dan Gita, anak keluarga terpandang yang terpilih menjadi ketua dan wakil ketua di kelasnya. Mulai dari sinilah tumbuh benih2 cinta antara keduanya, tetapi hubungan ini mendapat tentangan dari orang tua Astri.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak
programme.desc: Kisah 3 orang remaja yang mencari pengalaman tentang sex tapi dengan jalan aman, yaitu dengan kawin kontrak setelah mendengarkan ceramah saat mengikuti pesantren kilat. Dan mereka memutuskan untuk pergi ke daerah puncak mencari perempuan yang bisa dinikahkan secara kontrak.

programme.title: Karmila
programme.desc: Karmila yang mengandung karena diperkosa oleh pacarnya tidak menerima kehadiran sang anak. Sikapnya berubah saat sang anak sakit keras.

Namun saat mereka mulai mencoba melanjutkan ke jenjang yang lebih serius, orang tua mereka sangat bertentangan dengan rencana ini. Hingga dilema mereka memuncak saat Diana dijodohkan oleh Oka pria pilihan ibunya.

programme.title: Selamanya
programme.desc: Aristha berjumpa dengan kekasih lamanya, Bara, di kantor polisi. Bara, yang merasa bersalah karena menjerumuskan Aristha ke dunia narkoba, berusaha keras menarik Aristha dari dunia itu

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Lagi
programme.desc: Lila adalah pengacara idealis yang suka membela perempuan teraniaya dan Andre adalah pengacara dengan kasus-kasus "kelas kakap". Keduanya bertemu dalam kasus perceraian seorang penyanyi dangdut

programme.title: Jamila Dan Sang Presiden
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan bernama Jamila tiba-tiba menjadi headline di semua pemberitaan nasional. Ia mengaku membunuh seorang pejabat tinggi dan menolak mengajukan grasi kepada Presiden.

programme.title: Gentayangan
programme.desc: Abimanyu Karindra tak punya pilihan selain membawa istrinya, Sofia dan kedua anak mereka serta adiknya Sheila untuk menetap di hotel peninggalan orangtua di lembah gunung ratusan kilometer dari Jakarta, setelah dinyatakan bangkrut oleh pengadilan. Hotel Kaki Langit yang awalnya dianggap sebagai tempat tinggal yang nyaman dan tenang, berubah menjadi teror menakutkan hanya beberapa saat setelah keluarga Karindra mulai menempatinya.

programme.title: Maju Kena Mundur Kena Returns
programme.desc: Berkisah Trio WOW: Wira, Ozie dan Wulu yang tertantang menyelinap masuk ke asrama cewek-cewek cantik yang berdekatan dengan mini market tempat kerja mereka. Supaya bisa masuk Wira pura-pura impoten, Ojie pura-pura buta, sedangkan Wulu menyelinap ke asrama seperti maling.

programme.title: Sunan Kalijaga & Syech Siti Jenar
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang keadaan Majapahit setelah perang Paregreg. Keadaan sangat kacau dan rakyat banyak yang menderita. Lalu muncul masalah lagi, Syech Siti Jenar, wali yang nyeleneh, mengaku sebagai tuhan hingga dianggap menyeleweng dari ajaran Islam dan kemudian dihukum pancung.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak 3
programme.desc: Film ini merupakan kelajutan film sebelumnya, kisah dimulai ketika Kang Sono digantikan oleh Gerry sebagai makelar kawin kontrak. Dalam film ini terdapat 3 orang bernama Ceppy, Itol dan Dani. Petulangan cinta mereka dimulai ketika mereka diperkenalkan Gerry oleh juragan Janda Herang pembisnis kawin kontrak.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 10
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Churasan" Encore
programme.desc: Eri (Kuninaka Ryoko), from Kohama island, Okinawa, moves to Tokyo to become a nurse while cherishing a childhood promise of marriage with Fumiya (Kohashi Kenji). After reuniting with Fumiya, who is now a doctor, they get married and return to their hometown to dedicate themselves to providing medical support for locals. Amid a life filled with hard work and joy, holding onto her grandmother's saying, ‘Life is the greatest treasure,’ Eri brings the “moisture of the southern islands” to people's hearts.

programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.desc: A talented young MMA fighter trains hard to rise up the ranks. However, his goals are hindered when his lover is kidnapped. Release Year: 2022 Director: Puri Jagannadh

programme.title: Dhoom 3
programme.desc: Sahir, a circus entertainer, robs a bank in Chicago in order to avenge his father's death. His troubles increase when inspector Jai and Ali suspect him. Release Year: 2013 Director: Vijay Krishna Acharya Awards: 2014 Nominee Popular Award - Best Film Aditya Chopra, 2014 Winner Box Office India Award - Film Of The Year,Aditya Chopra

The appointment of Kapil Dev as the captain of the Indian national cricket team causes an uproar. All odds are against him when the squad faces a losing streak in the 1983 World Cup. Release Year: 2021 Director: Kabir Khan Awards: 2021 Winner Special Award - Best Movie of the Year Kabir Khan, 2022 Nominee Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Award - Favorite Movie, 2022 Nominee Asian Academy Creative Award - Best Feature Film, 2022 Winner IFF Award - Best Film

programme.title: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye
programme.desc: Prem starts drinking as all the girls he falls in love with want to marry 'a rich boy from the US'. Will he marry the girl of his dreams? Release Year: 2000 Director: K. Muralimohana Rao

programme.title: Atithi Tum Kab Jaoge
programme.desc: A working couple has an unexpected visitor who does not want to leave. Release Year: 2010 Director: Ashwni Dhir Awards: 2011 Winner Apsara Award- Best Comic Actor- Paresh Rawal, 2011 Winner Bollywood BusineSS Award- Most Profitable Actor- Ajay Devgn

programme.title: VIP 2: Lalkar
programme.desc: Raghuvaran, a young professional, sees his life made miserable by a businesswoman named Vasundhara when he declines her job offer. He thus assembles a group to take matters into their own hands. Release Year: 2017 Director: Soundarya Rajinikanth Vishagan

programme.title: Fatso
programme.desc: On discovering that his death was a mistake, Navin demands to be sent back to earth. Now he has to woo his fianc all over again in another guise. Release Year: 2012 Director: Rajat Kapoor

programme.title: Ugly Aur Pagli
programme.desc: An Engineering student's life changes drastically after the entry of an alcoholic and spunky woman. Release Year: 2008 Director: Sachin Kamlakar Khot

programme.title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
programme.desc: The happily married life of Sharda and Ranjeet is marred by dark clouds when he engages in an illicit affair with his secretary, Nirmala. Release Year: 1978

programme.title: Action Replayy
programme.desc: Fed-up with his parents constantly fighting, a young boy goes back in time to make his parents fall in love. This leads to hilarious situations. Release Year: 2010 Director: Vipul Amrutlal Shah Awards: 2011 Nominee Dainik Bhaskar Bollywood Award- Jodi of the Year- Akshay Kumar, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

programme.title: Housefull 2
programme.desc: The hunt for the richest son-in-law leads to complete chaos with every prospective groom pretending to be the richest. Release Year: 2012 Director: Sajid Khan Awards: Zee Cine Awards- Power Club - Box Office Award- Sajid Khan. Stardust Awards- Star of the Year - Male- Akshay Kumar, People's Choice Awards- Favorite Comedy Movie, Favorite Comedy Movie Star

programme.title: Yeh Dillagi
programme.desc: When Vicky, a rich playboy, begins an affair with Sapna, the daughter of a driver, his elder brother Vijay takes it upon himself to handle the situation. But he ends up falling in love with her. Release Year: 1994 Director: Naresh Malhotra Awards: 1995 Winner Screen Award- Best ActreSS- Kajol

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
programme.desc: Raj, a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI, follows Simran to India to win over her strict father and marry her. Release Year: 1995 Director: Aditya Chopra Awards: 43rd National Film Awards - Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment, 41st Filmfare Awards - Best Film

programme.title: Dum Laga Ke Haisha
programme.desc: Prem, a school dropout, hesitantly marries an educated but overweight girl, Sandhya. However, the two come closer when they take part in a race, which involves Prem carrying Sandhya on his back. Release Year: 2015 Director: Sharat Katariya Awards: 28 wins and 28 nominations

programme.title: Punjab Ka Singham
programme.desc: After taking charge as the DSP of Singham Khurd, Dilsher sets out to end the drug addiction among the youth of Punjab. This sets him against Bhuller, a business tycoon with connections in high places.

programme.title: Pyaar Karke Dekho
programme.desc: Ravi Kumar moves to Mumbai to pursue his lifelong dream of becoming a singer and dancer. He lies to his landlady that he is married but is baffled when Urvashi claims to be his wife. Release Year: 1987 Director: D. Rajendra Babu

programme.title: Ghar
programme.desc: Vikas regains his senses and finds himself in hospital with a head wound with Aarti too in the same hospital after being assaulted. Release Year: 1978 Director: Manik Chatterjee

programme.title: Kyo Kii Main Jhuth Nahi Bolta
programme.desc: Raj is a lawyer who finds great success through his habit of lying. However, when his son wishes for his father to stop lying, Raj is magically forced to speak the truth and gets into trouble.

programme.title: Raja
programme.desc: Raja and Madhu fall in love and decide to get married. However, her brothers are against the alliance and devise a plan to drive the two apart. Release Year: 1995 Director: Indra Kumar Awards: 1996 Nominee Filmfare Award - Best Film Indra Kumar

programme.title: Pyar To Hona Hi Tha
programme.desc: Sanjana loves Rahul, but Rahul treats Sanjana as a friend. He is attracted to Nisha, and announces that he will be marrying her soon. Release Year: 1998 Director: Anees Bazmee Awards: 1999 Nominee Filmfare Award -Best Film -Gordhan Tanwani

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mother's promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Maati Se Bandhi Dor
programme.desc: Hard-working Vaiju labours in the fields to support her family and village, but she finds her life facing an unexpected challenge when Rannvijay dismisses her as a potential wife.

programme.title: Iss Ishq Ka…Rabb Rakha
programme.desc: Ranbir is a proud sardar who falls in love with a Bengali woman, Meghla. But sparks fly when their culturally different families come face-to-face.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: A dreamy-eyed Sayali yearns for her prince charming. But when destiny ties her with hero-cum-thug Sachin, will her hopes for a fairytale life prevail?

programme.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
programme.desc: Star Plus has ventured into an unexplored territory and brings for the audience its new show Advocate Anjali Awasthi, starring Shritama Mitra (Advocate Anjali Awasthi) and Ankit Raizada (Aman Singh Rajpoot). The show is produced by Blues Productions.

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: Virat, a young police officer, marries a woman to honour the promise he made to her dying father. But when his former lover re-enters his life, he finds his heart pulled in both directions.

programme.title: Do Dooni Pyaar
programme.desc: The journey of Ganga and sheds light on the topic of forced marriage.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa, who parts with her ambitions and goals in a bid to raise her family, feels dejected when she fails to get any credit for her sacrifices and trials. She then decides to live on her own terms.

programme.title: Courants D'Est
programme.desc: The Ardennes Massif, an eroded mountain once as high as the Alps, overlooks the meanders of the Meuse and Semoy Rivers. A journey of discovery as we explore its secrets, between picturesque landscapes, protected natural zones, tales and legends, in the company of those who study and keep it alive.

programme.title: Édouard Louis, Les Années Amiens
programme.desc: Eddy Bellegueule, born in 1992 in the Picardy village of Hallencourt, ''died'' age 21 under the pen of Édouard Louis. No longer Eddy, but not yet Édouard, the writer changes, transforms himself and reinvents his life. Amiens will be his stopover, between Hallencourt and the world. We discover his story.

programme.title: Le 6H00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Amélie Et Compagnie
programme.desc: Amélie, Martin, Liam and Jenny all move in together in their new farm, which just happens to be the house that once belonged to Rose, Amélie's great-grandmother.

programme.title: La Langue Dans Ma Poche
programme.desc: It's fun for all with the lyrics of one of the hit songs by the Cowboys Fringants, we let the phone suggest words to complete expressions and Ève Côté talks about her favourite expressions from the Gaspé Peninsula.

programme.title: L'École De La Vie
programme.desc: Vincent may finally have managed to connect with his daughter, but his anger against the hospital continues to grow. Could the tragedy have been avoided? His own helplessness is echoed by that of Juliette, whose mother died a year earlier. A loss from which she has never really recovered...

programme.title: L'École De La Vie
programme.desc: Vincent is under pressure as he receives a visit from his parents-in-law. Still suffering acutely, they are having difficulty in finding their place in their grand-daughter's life. He also has to handle the situation of Mehdi, whose explanations for the bruises on his face are far from convincing.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Géopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Géopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Citoyen 2.0
programme.desc: A focus on the surprising power of repair cafés, the inventors of a revolutionary way of recycling plastic, and Adam and the Unbuilders, dismantling houses.

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: The Hauts-de-France, a region populated by attractive towns steeped in history and charm. Whilst its major cities, such as Lille and Amiens, undeniably have much to offer, the villages we discover are equally fascinating. Their rich and often unsuspected heritage is more than worth the trip!

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: At the Yves Saint Laurent museum: an exhibition dedicated to the great French designer's desire for transparency. Discovering the painful history behind Creole beauty and, in Revel, the art of woodworking imbued with skill and love. Baby blue, or how to explore the depths of style in all its aspects.

programme.title: L'Imagier Animé De Koumi

From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Étoiles
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children.

programme.title: Quasimodo
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Les P'Tits Diables
programme.desc: Between 6-year old Tom and his 8-year old sister Nina, it is war. They constantly fight like cat and dog. But for their parents, their moments of truce are even more worrying!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: Weekly current affairs program with French subtitles that review the major events of the week.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Vétérinaires
programme.desc: For Florence merely sounding Raja, a distinctly temperamental and dangerous zebu, is no easy task. Alix organises a brain operation to treat Arès the cat's epileptic fits. At the SPA animal sanctuary in Fribourg, Éléonore looks after Bobby, a dog traumatised by being abandoned.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: From Kabul to the vineyards of Alsace, Haroon Rahimi initially faced a long trek through Europe. In Alsace he met Stéphane Bannwarth and Isabelle Kuntzmann who entrusted him with producing wine from several dozen grape vines. Having become a winegrower and oenologist, he now lives with his family in Riquewihr.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Connexion Sauvage
programme.desc: With the queen of South Africa's cheetahs, Riana Van Nieuwenhuizen, Claudia is able to get incredibly close to the fastest animal on Earth. An opportunity to understand the specialist's infinite fascination for the species.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: Founded in 1908, the company La Cornue is a reference in the world of luxury ovens and cookers. All about the history of the ''marcel'' vest. In Saint-Léonard-de-Noblat, exploring the manufacture and printing of paper at the Moulin du Got paper mill. Wearing tights has never been so on-trend!

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: From Rubens to Degas, exploring the Pau Fine Arts Museum collections. Self-taught and Michelin-starred, at Le Grand Véfour the chef Guy Martin looks back at his gastronomic career. An uninhibited celebration of materials and colour with Rahul Mishra. Amandine Antunez masters the art of stucco marble using plant dyes.

programme.title: Le Grand Concert De La Francophonie 2024
programme.desc: For the third year running, francophone accents from all around the world came together in Quebec for an exceptional concert to celebrate music and the French language. On stage: 25 headline acts, nearly one hundred artists, dancers and choristers, 14 musicians and all under the Scott Price's conductor's baton.

programme.title: Répercussions
programme.desc: A group of friends see their lives turn upside down when one of them dies in a traffic accident after some heavy drinking at a birthday celebration. Salomé, the deceased's widow, has no choice but to bring charges and thus triggers a shock wave that will change their friendship forever.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Ouvrir La Voix
programme.desc: A documentary on black women whose origins lie in European colonial history in Africa and the Caribbean. Often reduced to clichés, as victims of discrimination they discuss their different backgrounds and the need to reclaim the narrative on this sensitive subject for themselves.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: Arriving on a crime scene, Paul and Erwan discover Léa's unconscious body. Taken to hospital, the inspector comes round but has no recollection of her attack. She thinks she's in 1996 and in love with Paul who has just asked her to marry him...

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: Manon, the young girl found dead on the beach, was in search of her biological parents. Is her quest connected with her murder? Is Léa finally going to recover her memory and be able to identify her attacker?

programme.title: Il Était Une Fois... Ces Drôles D'Objets
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kaun Kitney Paani Mein
programme.desc: The film wryly expresses the changes in hierarchy, caste and the power equation when water, the most important resource, vanishes and how the oppressed become the oppressors. The story is told through two villages which were split based on caste and money but never through water. In the current situation, through reversals of fortune, the old-world order has been broken and water becomes the biggest game changer. It has a domino effect on everything from social order to economics, even love and marriage. The film takes a satirical look at respect for resources, caste divides, and rural life against the backdrop of a traditional love story but all set in a realm where water is the new currency.

programme.title: Main Tera Hero
programme.desc: Sreenath Prasad aka Seenu (Varun Dhawan) is the most notorious boy in Ooty. He drops out of college in Ooty in order to pursue education in a Bangalore college. Here he falls in love with Sunaina. But Sunaina is forced to marry Angad, a local police officer, who is more of a terrorizing gangster. Seenu also has another die-hard lover in the form of Ayesha, of whom he is unaware. He had once saved her friends and Ayesha instantly knew that he was the perfect man for her. Ayesha's father is a big gangster and kidnaps Sunaina to get hold of Seenu and compel him to marry his daughter.

programme.title: Guddan S1
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Kundali Bhagya S3 Rerun
programme.desc: The story of Preeta and Shristhi, sisters who live with their father. Before dying their father reveals the truth that their mother is alive and living in Mumbai. Preeta and Shristhi's mother is Sarla Arora and they both are long lost sisters of Pragya (Kumkum Bhagya).

programme.title: Badho Bahu Rerun
programme.desc: Badho Bahu tells the story of an overweight girl, Komal, who gets the nickname Badho because of her physical appearance. Komal is made to perform heavy manual tasks that require physical strength. She is sweet, loving, energetic and simple girl. He has a big heart and helps most people in his town. Lucky Singh Ahlawat is a famous wrestler and is known for his looks. A series of events causes Komal and Lucky to get married.

programme.title: Haider
programme.desc: Vishal Bhardwaj's adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Hamlet', Haider - a young man returns home to Kashmir on receiving news of his father's disappearance. Not only does he learn that security forces have detained his father for harboring militants, but that his mother is in a relationship with his very own uncle. Intense drama follows between mother and son as both struggle to come to terms with news of his father's death. Soon Haider learns that his uncle is responsible for the gruesome murder, what follows is his journey to avenge his father's death.

programme.title: Veer
programme.desc: Circa 1920 British India, Pindari leader, Prithvi Singh, narrates his story to a Report from London Times about betrayal and deceit at the hands of the British and Madhavgarh's Raja Gyanendra Singh which led to the massacre of 4500 Pindaris. Although Prithvi sliced off Gyanendra's right arm, he has sworn to avenge and behead him and two-faced Britishers - who on one hand preach about Justice, Fraternity and Equality, but conquer and rule vulnerable natives - fueling hate and division on lines of religion, and caste. He sends his sons, Veer Pratap and Poonam, to Britain to learn about their devious ways, so that he can conquer Madhavgarh. The duo, despite of Lord Macaulay's malicious policy to convert foreign nationals to his way of thinking, not only pick up the relevant skills but also slay Yuvraj Sujan Singh, the only son of Gyanendra, much to the joy of the Pindaris. But Prithvi is in for a shock when he finds out that Veer has decided to wed Yashodhara...

programme.title: Ramaiyya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: City boy Ram falls in love with village belle Sona, who has been raised by her brother, Raghuveer. However, when his mother insults Sona, Raghuveer asks Ram to prove himself worthy of marrying Sona.

programme.title: Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo
programme.desc: Major General Amarjeet Singh (Amitabh Bachchan) is a dedicated officer for the Indian army. His son Lieutenant Commander Vikramjeet Singh (Bobby Deol) follows in his footsteps and joins the army. Amarjeet is extremely proud of Vikramjeet but tragedy strikes when Vikramjeet is killed in action. Many years pass, Vikramjeet's son Captain Kunal Singh (Bobby Deol) joins the army but has no intentions of remaining there. He instead plans to leave, settle abroad and earn lots of money. Amarjeet is disappointed with Kunal as he hopes his grandson would do something to honour his deceased father. Kunal comes across a desert party and sees Shweta Bhansali (Divya Khosla). It is love at first sight for him but she totally ignores him and does everything to avoid him. However she is doing this for a reason- she was once married. programme.title: Kaun Kitney Paani Mein
programme.desc: The film wryly expresses the changes in hierarchy, caste and the power equation when water, the most important resource, vanishes and how the oppressed become the oppressors. The story is told through two villages which were split based on caste and money but never through water. In the current situation, through reversals of fortune, the old-world order has been broken and water becomes the biggest game changer. It has a domino effect on everything from social order to economics, even love and marriage. The film takes a satirical look at respect for resources, caste divides, and rural life against the backdrop of a traditional love story but all set in a realm where water is the new currency.
